MD Best Practices

A collection of best practices from professional organizations, curated by doctors, for doctors

AHA best practices

  • Gout

    AHA
    • Gout is a kind of arthritis caused by a buildup of uric acid crystals in the joints.
    • Gout, get out!

    Source: WebMD

Guidelines given here are intended to be inputs to clinical judgment, not substitutes. They should not guide patient care alone. See our full disclaimer.
